name: Spellguard
description:
Throw yourself into the world of Spellguard - a medieval/fantasy themed role-playing card game. Fight as different heroes and explore their decks. Play against the computer or a friend sitting next to you. Master powerful combos and achieve victory. Simple to get into, challenging to master.

This is the first game I'm proud to show and share around. I know it's not the next big hit from an AAA studio, but I worked super hard for many weeks, learned a lot, and most importantly: had tons of fun. I'd love to hear your thoughts and your feedback. If there's something you'd like to share directly with me, my twitter handles are @MraveniskoDev and @DanielBreiner_.

Thank you for playing!
